account_inactive: Your account is inactive. Please check your email to verify it.
account_not_verified: Account not verified. A verification code has been sent to your email.
account_already_verified: Your account is already verified. You can log in directly.
new_otp_sent: New OTP generated and sent to your email
user_exists: The user with this email already exists in the system.
no_verification_code: No verification code found for this user

document_deleted_successfully: Successfully deleted all chunks for document
document_id_required: You must provide a 'document_id' for deletion.
document_not_found: No documents found with the specified document_id
